name: Girly Real Tree
description:
You will love to snuggle up your little one in both layers of this luxurious Minky! You will not want to put this blanket, or the baby down! The blanket will be bound with a coordinating satin edge. It measures approx. 30x37 inches.

Don't forget to add a name embroidered in the corner. Or you can choose to have stitching- child's name and birthdate can be stitched all the way around the blanket for only $5 more. This is the extra special touch that will make your item totally custom to you or the person receiving it!

Please allow 1 to 2 weeks for shipping as these are custom made.

name: Bright Big Dots
description:
Instead of hauling around their favorite big blanket, grab the tag-along! It is perfect for outings, traveling, or just to snuggle with as your child soothes themselves to sleep. Also great for teething babies.

There are 2 loops that are in tact, the rest are back to back pieces of ribbon.

*If you do not see the combination that you are looking for please let me know and I can design one just for you!*

Dimensions: 11" x 11" (not including tabs)

Don't forget to add a name for only $5 more! Just leave a comment during checkout of the name you want embroidered on it.

Shipping time is 1-2 weeks.

Don't forget to add a name embroidered in the corner.   Or you can choose to have stitching- child's name and birthdate can be stitched all the way around the blanket for only $5 more.  This is the extra special touch that will make your item totally custom to you or the person receiving it!

Please allow 1 to 2 weeks for shipping as these are custom made.

name: Transportation
description:
Instead of hauling around their favorite big blanket, grab the tag-along! It is perfect for outings, traveling, or just to snuggle with as your child soothes themselves to sleep.  Also great for teething babies.

There are 2 loops that are in tact, the rest are back to back pieces of ribbon. 


*If you do not see the combination that you are looking for please let me know and I can design one just for you!*

Dimensions: 11" x 11" (not including tabs)

Don't forget to add a name for only $5 more!  Just leave a comment during checkout of the name you want embroidered on it.  

Shipping time is 1-2 weeks.
